intro: Welcome to my site! Make yourself at home and click around.

sections.content:
Welcome to my site! Make yourself at home and click around.

My name is John Miyao and I currently live in sunny Seattle, WA. I've worked in tech most of my career, but this year (2022), I finally decided to make the transition into Engineering. It's been a fun journey learning to code, but I know it's only just the beginning.

Outside of work, I prioritize my family and friends who I consider family, my health and my time. I like to stay active and run, cycle, play basketball, golf and I really want to try pickle ball. Don't get me wrong though, I spend more than my fair share lounging. I'd call myself lazy active if such a term exists.
